sentence.Network_en: " Nothing, " replied the girl, her head cocked coquettishly on one side.
sentence.Network_cn: “ 没什么, " 姑娘风骚地把头一歪,回答.

when he asked her about it , she grinned coquettishly and told him that she had lost one hand a few years back and now wore a golden hand in its place .当他询问了她关于它，她卖弄风情咧嘴了并且告诉了他她在它的地方丢失了一只手几年和现在佩带了一只金黄手。
